summary: Before we issue reports, we send them to the agencies we've audited for review and comment. For reports containing sensitive or classified information, we also ask the agency to let us know what can or cannot be released publicly. Delays in these reviews can delay the issuance of our reports. This Q&A report, the third in a series of four, details the timeliness of DOD's...
title: DOD Reviews and Responses to GAO Reports: Third Semiannual Report Examining Delays
